name: If some error occurs, the download is restarted in 15s
On New User Stream
About inject new messages
info:
On every new message, the On Message state of the function node is activated and its code is executed.

In this case, it means that on every new message, another stream is created, i.e, more than one stream will listen to changes on the user's collection.

This is a bad thing. That's why the inject node should not be use more than once.

Fortunetly, we are unable tu inject messages within subflows.

Update Siren State
Action lifetime
info:
How to avoid get one new action on each new deploy?

I have inserted an "updateTime" property to the
document.

If the updateTime compared to the system time at
the arrived moment is greater than 10 seconds,
so the action is not valid anymore.

name: About Notifications Answer
info:
The notification document has its own "answer"
property. But, this answer has no use here (embedded system), it is for the app information only.

Every time a user asnwers a notification, the answer
property is set as well as the "action" property in Action document, which value is responsible to apply changes to embbeded system.

Series of repeatable actions issue
info:
Quando o aplicativo responde a notificao pela barra, ao usar o boto ignore, a mesma ao  repetida vrias vezes em um curto perodo de tempo.

Esse n trigger deixa passar apenas uma delas.
